long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We’re Dial Faster.  A chrome extension to cut post call processing time down to 1 click.  By automating some of the most tedious work sales reps do we improve the ROI of inside sales teams. 

No more scrolling the mouse between calls. The most common actions are tied to hotkeys on the keyboard. One click. Done. Next call.

Dial Faster is proven to be 600% faster then recording your calls by hand. Don’t waste time recording call actions. Instantly save and record your most used call actions and focus on growing production.

We save time. We save money. We improve call action recording. Our goal is to improve the lives of our users. 

Most importantly, other than checking for an active license key no data ever leaves your laptop. Your privacy is critical to us.

CRMs include:
Sales Force, Velocify, Monday.com, Pipedrive, Hubspot, SAP, Capsule
